reviewText: If you are a Uschi fan, its pretty good

Uschi  Digard  is  simply  one  of  the  most  lovely  women  in  the  porn  business.  She  is  sultry,  sophisticated,  and  has  such  depth,  in  that  face,  it  is  hard  NOT  to  think  of  her,  as  you  lay  in  bed.
Unlike  most  of  the porn  queens,  Uschi  Digard  is  far  more  subtle .  Her  moves  tell  a  story,  her  glances  freeze  you in  your  tracks.
She  is  European and  of  this  there  isn't  any  doubt...Uschi  is  so  natural  with  her  sexuality,  that  it's  almost  like  NOT  actually  seeing  a  porno  film,  and  the  woman  does  know  hoe  to act. In a  word,  Uschi  Digard  is  smooth... never  breaking  a  sweat,  while  the  water  peels  off  every  part  of  your  own  body,  like  a  bad  day  in  the  desert.

I read the summary and knew that this collection included 3 movies, which I thought would feature Uschi.  Well, two of them do.  Fancy Lady and the original Pleasures of a Woman feature Uschi.  The third full length feature is a remake of Pleasures which Uschi is not even in.  The originals don't do her justice.  From what I remember, and I'd rather forget, Fancy Lady didn't show Uschi until about 45 minutes in.  Yes, she's topless, going to nude, but it's a rather unremarkable scene, in my opinion.  In Pleasures, she is nude quite a bit, but is laying down, or otherwise posed/positioned such that you don't really get good shots of her beautiful breasts.  And let's face it, that's what people who are buying this want to see.  The "rare Uschi shorts" are terrible quality.

In summary, if you want to see Uschi nude, doing her thing, there are MUCH better options.  Take it from a died-in-the-wool, lifelong boob guy.
it is in very good condition, considering the age of these movies and the equipment they used, and the camera's, but it is worth watching Uschi Digard natural breast.
